BiocPkgTools 0.99.9

Reference

General package information

These functions access Bioconductor package metadata and return results as R objects.

BiocPkgTools

BiocPkgTools: Examine and analyze Bioconductor package metadata

biocBuildReport()

Tidy Bioconductor build report results

biocDownloadStats()

get bioconductor download stats

biocPkgList()

Get full bioc software package listing, with details

getBiocVignette()

Download a Bioconductor vignette

getPackageInfo()

Generate needed inforamation to create DOI from a package directory

problemPage()

generate hyperlinked HTML for build reports for Bioc packages

Dependency graphs

Work with package dependencies as graphs.

buildPkgDependencyDataFrame()

Work with Bioconductor package dependencies

buildPkgDependencyIgraph()

Work with package dependencies as a graph

inducedSubgraphByPkgs()

Return a minimal subgraph based on package name(s)

subgraphByDegree()

Subset graph by degree

Utilities

Some of these are internal to the Bioconductor project. In particular, the DOI-related functions are available for completeness, but not meant to be used by individuals.

dataciteXMLGenerate()

Bioc datacite xml generator

generateBiocPkgDOI()

Generate a DOI for a bioconductor package

githubURLParts()

Extract github user and repo name from github URL
